## ButtonGroupItem interface

Argument type for a single button in the group, e.g.

```
[{onclick: () => alert("foo") }, ["i.fas.fa-check"], "foo"]

```

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ButtonGroupItem extends Array<any> 
```
